description: This file defines a Python class YFinanceTools that provides various methods to fetch financial data from Yahoo Finance using the yfinance library. It includes methods for current stock price, company info, historical prices, fundamentals, income statements, financial ratios, analyst recommendations, company news, and technical indicators. The class is designed to be configurable via constructor arguments to enable or disable specific tools.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for retrieving various types of financial data from Yahoo Finance using the yfinance library. It inherits from Toolkit and provides methods for stock prices, company info, historical data, fundamentals, income statements, ratios, recommendations, news, and technical indicators.

methods.name: get_current_stock_price
methods.description: Fetches the current stock price for a given symbol using yfinance.

methods.name: get_company_info
methods.description: Retrieves detailed company information and overview for a given stock symbol.

methods.name: get_historical_stock_prices
methods.description: Retrieves historical stock prices for a specified period and interval.

methods.name: get_stock_fundamentals
methods.description: Fetches fundamental data such as market cap, P/E ratio, dividend yield, etc., for a given stock symbol.

methods.name: get_income_statements
methods.description: Retrieves income statement data for a given stock symbol.

methods.name: get_key_financial_ratios
methods.description: Fetches key financial ratios and metrics for a given stock symbol.

methods.name: get_analyst_recommendations
methods.description: Retrieves analyst recommendations for a given stock symbol.

methods.name: get_company_news
methods.description: Fetches recent news articles related to the company for a given stock symbol.

methods.name: get_technical_indicators
methods.description: Retrieves technical indicator data such as historical prices over a specified period.
